attributes.additional_details:
We ask our government to protect our belief and our way of life. By including our faith, Islam, the holy book the Quran, our belief in the prophet Mohammed, and the word Allah, to the Christians Blasphemy Law.
Also to include the faith of other, British nationals, Judaism and the hole book the Torah, Hinduism, Sikhism, Buddhism, and ones belief in the prophesy, and the scripts.
Islam is the Law of God, which was preached by all the prophets, anybody who practised and or practises the Law of God, is a Muslim.
Muslim’s believe in 124,000 (plus or minus) prophets, starting from Adam, Noah, David, Lut, Sulaman, Abraham, Isaac, Ismail, Moses, Haroon, Jesus, and Mohammed (peace and blessing be up on all of them).
The Muslims are also waiting for the return of Jesus Christ.
The British legal system requires to be revised and amended.
